duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and revise drawings of basic components based on verbal or written instructions and sketches.
Plot drawings, follow company and client drafting standards and procedures, and learn the practices of a selected discipline.
Produce high-quality drawings, following the quality procurement process, and demonstrating high attention to detail.
Adapt to new client standards and learn new programs based on client needs, such as Civil 3D, PLS-CAD, AutoCAD Electrical, among others.
Maintain high-level performance in quality while adapting quickly to client requirements.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Computer-Aided Drafting and Design, or CAD Certificate
